column2: "Oh! Did you find anything? Thank you! Please, tell me all about it right now!"

"So that one's wide base and number of legs gives it stability, and the other one moves its torso around to keep its balance...
I see!"
"If I can use these as a basis for the statue's appearance and internals, I think I can pull this off!"
"My Halloween horror statue will dominate the center of the venue! As for what it'll look like, I'm going to keep that a secret until we open!"
